Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a problem that involves people needing to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a string telephone that uses sound to communicate information between two students.
The student can label the important parts of the string telephone, such as the cups and the string.
The student can show how the string telephone can send or receive messages.
The student can depict how people would use the string telephone to solve the problem of communicating over distance.
The student can include in their drawing how people benefit from communicating over long distances using technology.
